title: How to Draw a Flamingo Using MS Paint

steps.headline: Draw a pink oval for the body.
Change ink color to black, thicken the lines, and draw the legs - they are shaped like a backward facing,fancy "4".
Add a small circle for the head and connect it to the body with a curve.
Fill the color into the head and body.
Darken the beak and thicken the neck.
Adjust the shape of the tail to balance the body.
Don't worry if your first sketch turns out like this one.
steps.description: Just try again. You'll get it!

steps.headline: Click "Save As" and select jpg for best transferability of the sketch to web based content.

text: Draw a pink oval for the body.  Add several tail feathers.  Change ink color to black, thicken the lines, and draw the legs - they are shaped like a backward facing,fancy "4".  Add a small circle for the head and connect it to the body with a curve. Hand draw the curved beak. Fill the color into the head and body.  Darken the beak and thicken the neck.  Adjust the shape of the tail to balance the body.  Don't worry if your first sketch turns out like this one. Just try again. You'll get it! Click "Save As" and select jpg for best transferability of the sketch to web based content.
